Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: ([ "cbf":"sp_alteration", "cbo":\, "cost":50.0, "desc":"Trait alterations are specifically when changing one body-part to appear different. Do note that this does not include ADDING a trait to an existing body-part (compare \\"blue eyes\\" to \\"seablue eyes\\" versus \\"leg\\" to \\"shapely leg\\"). Trait alterations are approved or declined on a per-request basis. They should generally be non-intrusive and adhere to the concept of show-not-tell; \\"beautiful hair\\" is bad, \\"autumn hair\\" is better.", "feature":"alteration", "global":1 ])

([ "cbf":"sp_nickname", "cbo":\, "cost":10.0, "desc":"Buy a nickname for the current character. The character can then be referred to in-game using the nickname. Please see @help nicknames for further information on this. If you choose an inappropriate nickname, staff will most likely remove it.", "feature":"nickname", "global":1 ])
